list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the external side or surface of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: record the date on the outside of the file
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ghi lại ngày ở bên ngoài tệp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the external appearance of someone or something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: was he as straight as he appeared on the outside ?
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta có thẳng như anh ta xuất hiện ở bên ngoài không?

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: situated on or near the exterior or external surface of something.
not belonging to or coming from within a particular group.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi có một số trợ giúp bên ngoài

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: situated or moving beyond the boundaries or confines of.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there was a boy outside the door
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có một cậu bé bên ngoài cửa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: beyond the limits or scope of.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the high cost of shipping has put it outside their price range
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chi phí vận chuyển cao đã đưa nó ra ngoài phạm vi giá của họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: not within the boundaries or confines of a place.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the dog was still barking outside
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Con chó vẫn đang sủa bên ngoài
